title: Leading cause of ransomware infection 2019
summary: This statistic shows the results of a survey among American Poor_user_practices/gullibility owners on the Leading of cause they estimate to spend 2019 annum on their Poor_user_practices/gullibility .
The survey was conducted in 2019 , and is sorted 2019 type of purchase/reason for Cause .
The Percentage Leading ransomware on Lack_of_cyber_security_training for infection thus adds up to an Percentage mean Leading of approximately 36 respondents 2019 .
gold: This statistic depicts the leading causes of ransomware infections according to MSPs worldwide in 2019 . According to the survey , 67 percent of responding MSPs indicated that phishing scams were the most common cause of ransomware infection .
